summary: Kidnappers demand six million in ransom, but the United Nations does not negotiate with terrorists. One of the best counterfeiters is serving a lengthy prison term and the agent who arrested him needs his help.
cast: Piotr Adamczyk|Marian Dziedziel|Andrzej Chyra|Jerzy Trela|Karolina Gruszka|Robert Wieckiewicz|Lukasz Simlat|Bartlomiej Topa|Agnieszka Warchulska|Eryk Lubos|Grazyna Szapolowska|Jacek Rozenek|Ewa Dalkowska|Redbad Klynstra|Adam Molak|Marta Dabrowska|Henryk Talar|Ryszard Radwanski|Joachim Lamza|Edward Zentara|Grzegorz Mitura|Robert Wabich|Aleksander Mikolajczak|Michal Banach|Bogdan Chrabota|John Weisgerber|David Jasmin|Phillip Goss|Piotr Pamula|Eric Stepniewski
title: Trick
